participant_1.background:
I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future.
I love to create spooky decorations for Halloween.
I need a place where I can practice my guitar without disturbing the neighbors.
I get to work from home, so I can avoid my allergens.
I'm counting down the days to retirement and enjoying my singing time in the shower.

participant_2.background:
I'm often called by a nickname by my friends.
i have a toddler.
i like to make my own coffee.
i m really into the powers of crystals.
I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood.

content.text: Hey, what's up? I'm from [hometown], but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future.
Hey there! I'm actually from [hometown] too. I live in [current location] now with my toddler. What do you do for work?
I get to work from home, so I can avoid my allergens. I'm counting down the days to retirement and enjoying my singing time in the shower.
That's awesome! I have a toddler too. I love making my own coffee and I'm really into the powers of crystals. I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood.
Do you make your own coffee with a French press? I love the way it tastes.
I do! I love the way it tastes too. I've been trying to figure out how to get my toddler to drink it, but he's not a fan.
Maybe you can make it into a fun drink for him? Maybe add some chocolate or vanilla extract?
That's a great idea! I'll have to try that.
Cool! We should get together sometime and make coffee together.
That would be fun! We can bring our toddlers too.
